name: Dino Puzzle Kid Dinosaur Games
description:
***** A Must have for every kid who loves Dinosaurs! *****
Dino Puzzle contains an increasing library of engaging puzzles, games and learning activities for preschool kids in the ages 1-5. Homeschooling has never been so easy and fun!

New: Create your own puzzles! Either using the game assets or bring photos from your device and turn them into puzzles!

Your kids will just love these wonderfully drawn puzzles. With bright, joyful colors each puzzle
Positive and pleasant feedback for the kid for each part and when puzzle is complete.

Content:
* 20 Puzzle Packs, over 1000 predefined puzzles.
* Set your preferred puzzle size starting from 2 pieces up to 30
* Play a new daily puzzle each day in 4 play variants - jigsaw puzzle, swipe puzzle, scratch card and color scratch
* Paint your own puzzles - paint by hand or import your pictures to create infinite new puzzles!
* Dozens of new games and learning activities:
+Learning numbers,
+ Counting,
+ Addition,
+ Subtraction,
+ Shapes,
+ Colors,
+ Order by size,
+ Order Numbers,
+ Number line,
+ Patterns,
+ Tell Time,
+ Matrix matching,
+ More & Less,
+ Great & Small,
+ Big & Small,
+ Long & Short,
+ Tall & Short.
+ Bubbles shoot,
+ Match,
+ Memory,
+ Domino,
+ Maze,
+ Cookies,
+ Whack a bunny,
+ Connect the Dots,
+ Raining shapes
+ Animals Flow (New - 5 animal packs. 5x5-10x10 boards. 600 levels!)
+ Balloon Pop (New - learn colors, shapes, numbers and english ABC)
* Increasing difficulty level as your kid advances.

+ The game Does Not contain ads.
+ The game contains In App Purchases to subscribe.
+ The first 3 puzzles are open for free. If your kids likes this game and you would like to purchase the rest of the puzzles and all additional packages, you can unlock the rest from the parents section.

Important - If during an update or for some other reason the purchase seems to be lost, you can easily return the purchase - just press on one of the locked puzzles and then press the "Restore" button for 3 seconds on the popup.

If you have any issues, please contact us at info@tiltangames.com
